title: Important Bloodstain Paper Now in Spanish at SEAM
post: Thanks for the comment Gabriel but you got to understand that Andy at shroudnm.com did his best to finish the translation even though is not perfect in Spanish…  At least, like you said, it can be followed !!!  That’s the principal I guess…
